name: Robotic Bomber
description:
Strike your eyes with the dazzling bomber game. Explode your anger within your hand.
You have to blow up all the roadblocks surrounded you to seek a hidden key that hides in the field. The key which leads you to the goal. And do not forget to be alert, because you have to deal with the boss and all the troublemakers with different actions, behaviors and also different environments (forests, lava, ice, toy city). If you not, you will easily be eliminated by them.
Let’s the journey begins.

Robotic Bomber Feature
- Challenge your ability with more than 35 stages
- Familiar Bomber man gameplay with touchscreen control system.
- Collect Power-Up. Plan wisely, easily bring victory to you.
- Defeat the enemies with the Added ability outfits.
- Collect coins to unlock new bombs.
- AI Challenge Mode for fight in PVP.
- Beautiful scenes and adorable decors
